body:
That's great news the book's finally available!  This is the first I've 
heard of it.


I just wanted to add a note regarding the "revised" version in the 
title.  Not much was actually changed from the first edition, since we 
didn't have time (or thought we didn't a year ago when we started this 
process) to add any new chapters, which is what we'd really need to do. 
  Plus, we were restricted to working with the PDF from Morgan Kaufmann, 
since the originals were all lost.  All we did was fix a few typos and 
formulas, since the opportunity presented itself.


-Greg
___
